Plot: A tribute to the late German choreographer, Pina Bausch, as her dancers perform her most famous creations.
Title: Pina
Actors: Regina Advento, Malou Airaudo, Ruth Amarante, Jorge Puerta
tomatoConsensus: Pina is an immersive, gorgeously shot tribute to the people who express life through movement.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 22 nominations.
Language: German, Russian, Portuguese, Korean, English, Croatian, Italian, French, Spanish
